title: Compare buildings by Venturi and Jefferson

content.question: Robert Venturi’s House in New Castle County is most similar to Thomas Jefferson’s Monticello in its

choices.label: incorporation of spolia from other buildings
location in a dense urban environment

topic.text: 4.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
